statements: SELECT * FROM demand_analysis;
SELECT demand_id, demand_date, demand_amount FROM demand_analysis;
SELECT demand_date, demand_amount FROM demand_analysis ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT demand_id, demand_amount FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(demand_amount) AS average_demand FROM demand_analysis;
SELECT demand_id, demand_date, demand_amount FROM demand_analysis;
SELECT demand_amount, demand_forecast FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_forecast > 0.5 ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT demand_id, demand_amount FROM demand_analysis WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY demand_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(demand_amount) AS max_demand_amount, MIN(demand_amount) AS min_demand_amount FROM demand_analysis;
SELECT * FROM demand_variability_statistical_models;
SELECT id, model_name, demand_pattern FROM demand_variability_statistical_models;
SELECT model_name, seasonality_pattern, accuracy_metrics FROM demand_variability_statistical_models;
SELECT * FROM robust_forecasting_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, forecasting_method, efficiency_metrics FROM robust_forecasting_strategies;
SELECT id, model_name FROM demand_variability_statistical_models WHERE seasonality_pattern = 'Weekly'
SELECT strategy_name, forecasting_method FROM robust_forecasting_strategies WHERE risk_assessment = 'High' ORDER BY strategy_name DESC
SELECT * FROM demand_variability_statistical_models WHERE demand_pattern LIKE '%Trending%'
SELECT id, model_name, accuracy_metrics FROM demand_variability_statistical_models WHERE model_name = 'ARIMA' OR model_name = 'Exponential Smoothing'
SELECT strategy_name, efficiency_metrics FROM robust_forecasting_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name ASC
SELECT * FROM demand_variation_analysis LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, demand_amount FROM demand_variation_analysis WHERE demand_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM statistical_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, forecasting_method, effectiveness_rating FROM forecasting_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 0.8;
SELECT id, product_name, demand_amount, demand_date FROM demand_variation_analysis WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, product_name, demand_amount, demand_date FROM demand_variation_analysis WHERE demand_amount > 500 ORDER BY demand_date DESC
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM statistical_models WHERE model_accuracy >= 0.8 ORDER BY model_name
SELECT id, strategy_name, forecasting_method, effectiveness_rating FROM forecasting_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating < 0.5 ORDER BY strategy_name
SELECT product_name, demand_amount FROM demand_variation_analysis WHERE demand_amount BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT id, model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM statistical_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM demand_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM demand_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT price, product_name FROM demand_data WHERE product_name = 'Product1';
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM statistical_models WHERE model_type='Regression';
SELECT strategy_name, implementation FROM forecasting_strategies WHERE strategy_name='Strategy2';
SELECT * FROM demand_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT demand_date, forecasted_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, parameters FROM statistical_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY model_name;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation, performance_metrics FROM forecasting_strategies WHERE implementation = 'Time Series' ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM demand_data WHERE quantity < 50 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DemandData;
SELECT product_name, demand_quantity FROM DemandData WHERE price > 100;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_quantity, confidence_level FROM ForecastData WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT model_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ModelParameters WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression';
SELECT * FROM DemandData ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC, price ASC;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT model_name, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ModelParameters WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression';
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, forecast_quantity, confidence_level FROM ForecastData WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, model_id, analysis_date, result_summary FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
